short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The FinLock Web Security extension blocks harmful or malicious websites accessed by users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The FinLock Web Security extension blocks harmful or malicious websites that users might access by clicking links in email, social media/messaging applications or entered manually on browsers. 

The extension leverages "Cloud-Native" AI/ML-based detection to analyze the websites using 45+ data points and gives a response within a few seconds, protecting enterprises from zero-day and other ransomware attacks instantly.

Here is how it works:-
1) User signs in with his/her enterprise credentials
2) User opens a website or clicks a weblink on other applications (email, social media apps etc.)
3) The extension analyzes the webpage on the cloud servers and immediately blocks the website if it detects malicious behavior.

Note: No user data is read, shared or processed by the extension.

Please contact us at sales@finlock.in for more details and we will be happy to schedule a quick demo for your enterprise.
